Class DistributedMap<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.copycat.Resource
      • io.atomix.copycat.collections.DistributedMap<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The map key type.
    V - The map entry type.

    public class DistributedMap<K,V>
extends Resource
    Distributed map.

    Jordan Halterman
